org.openlcb.cdi.impl

Class MemorySpaceCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.cdi.impl.MemorySpaceCache

  • public class MemorySpaceCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Maintains the connection to a specific remote node's specific memory space, and maintains a cache of the information retrieved from there.

    Created by bracz on 4/2/16.

      • addRangeToCache

        public void addRangeToCache(long start,
                            long end)
        Prepares for caching a given range.
        Parameters:
        start - address of first byte to be cached (inclusive)
        end - address of first byte after the cached region

      • addRangeListener

        public void addRangeListener(long start,
                             long end,
                             java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener)
        Registers a listener to be called when a given address range experiences a change. Will only be called upon initial load when the entire range has been loaded.
        Parameters:
        start - address in the space of the first monitored byte (includive)
        end - address of the first byte after the monitored range (i.e. range end exclusive)
        listener - callback to invoke

      • fillCache

        public void fillCache()
        Instructs the class to load all data that needs to be pre-cached.

      • read

        public byte[] read(long offset,
                   int len)

      • write

        public void write(long offset,
                  byte[] data,
                  ConfigRepresentation.CdiEntry cdiEntry)

      • reload

        public void reload(long origin,
                   int size)
        Performs a refresh of some data. Calls the data update listeners when done.
        Parameters:
        origin - address of first byte in memory space to reload
        size - number of bytes to reload
